cds::opt::buffer< TYPE > Struct Template Reference

Option setter for user-provided plain buffer [type-option]. More...

#include <cds/opt/buffer.h>

Detailed Description

template<typename TYPE>
struct cds::opt::buffer< TYPE >

Option setter for user-provided plain buffer [type-option].

This option is used by some container as a random access array for storing cointainer's item; for example, a bounded queue may use this option to define underlying buffer implementation.

The template parameter TYPE may be rebindable.

Implementations:

  • opt::v::static_buffer
  • opt::v::dynamic_buffer
